metaTags.metaDescription: Cloudflare Impact brings together our programs for accessibility, privacy, security, sustainability, and community as part of our mission to help build a better Internet.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare Impact
relatedBlades.copy:
Our mission is to help build a better Internet. We believe a better Internet can be not only a force for good but also an engine of global sustainability.

Download our 2022 Impact Report:

relatedBlades.title: Impact spotlight
relatedBlades.copy:
As part of [Impact Week 2022](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/impact-week/), we announced that we are adding the Cloudflare One Zero Trust suite to our Project Galileo and Athenian Project programs. This will help participants deflect phishing attacks, securely connect employees and partners, and secure their path to the Internet.   

- Learn more about what [Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) entails and check out our [roadmap](https://zerotrustroadmap.org/) 
- Read the [full announcement](https://blog.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-zero-trust-for-galileo-and-athenian/) 
- See what's included in [Cloudflare One Zero Trust](https://www.cloudflare.com/products/zero-trust/zero-trust-network-access/)
- Apply to [Project Galileo](https://www.cloudflare.com/galileo/) or [Athenian Project](https://www.cloudflare.com/athenian/)
relatedBlades.subheadline: Zero Trust for Project Galileo and Athenian Project

imageAssetFile.altText: Customer story: Zero Trust for Project Galileo Participants
imageAssetFile.title: Customer story: Zero Trust for Project Galileo Participants

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet helps protect the health of our planet
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is committed to powering its network with 100% renewable energy and offsetting or removing all historical emissions associated with powering its network by 2025. 

To learn more about our greenhouse gas emissions and renewable energy purchases, see our [2021](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/cyKi7QPKmmWoSnnKl7ogp/0b3a4438da311ce2315afa52013e5cee/Cloudflare_Emissions_Inventory_2021.pdf) and [2020](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/2YzIeTtzSbyKkM4GsryP5S/62ce0dff98e92a142281a0b462ce4408/Cloudflare_Emissions_Inventory_-_2020.pdf) Carbon Emissions Inventory Reports.

As a member of the UN Global Compact, Cloudflare is committed to developing environmentally friendly technologies.

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet is built on respect for human rights
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is committed to respecting human rights under the [UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights](https://www.ohchr.org/documents/publications/guidingprinciplesbusinesshr_en.pdf "UN Guiding Principles on Business and Human Rights").

- Read our full [human rights](https://www.cloudflare.com/resources/images/slt3lc6tev37/fdLHB1OGp8ZWwzCTVlM0n/e0a42a032592ded778bda8c31c6747b1/BDES-2133_Impact-Week-Human-Rights-Policy.pdf "Human Rights Policy") policy.

As a [Global Network Initiative (GNI)](https://globalnetworkinitiative.org/ "Global Network Initiative") member, we are committed to helping to protect and advance freedom of expression and privacy online.

relatedBlades.title: How Cloudflare helps promote human rights online

features.title: Project Galileo
features.description: Project Galileo provides free security services to thousands of organizations working in the arts, human rights, civil society, journalism, and democracy.

features.title: Athenian Project
features.description: Election websites need to be fast, reliable, and secure â€” Athenian Project provides resources to help with all three goals.

features.title: Cloudflare for Campaigns
features.description: Cloudflare for Campaigns meets the essential needs of political campaigns, including securing candidates' web presence and safeguarding internal network and data.

features.title: Project Pangea
features.description: With Project Pangea, we can help communities solve the network challenges of routing traffic to and from the Internet.

relatedBlades.title: A better Internet is built by teams that are diverse and inclusive
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is building a thriving, collaborative culture where we respect each other's work, listen to new ideas, and encourage each other's growth. 
- Learn more about [life at Cloudflare](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/life-at-cloudflare/ "Life at Cloudflare"), including our [employee resource groups](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/employee-resource-groups/ "Employee Resource Groups") and [diversity initiatives](https://blog.cloudflare.com/tag/diversity/ "Diversity"). 
- Cloudflare is using [returnship](https://blog.cloudflare.com/moving-forward-with-path-forward/ "Moving Forward with Path Forward") and [apprenticeship](https://www.aspeninstitute.org/programs/cybersecurity-technology-program/aspencyber-workforce-pipeline/ "Major Employers Commit to Build a Stronger Cybersecurity Workforce Pipeline") programs to help recruit and elevate diverse voices in cyber security.  
- Cloudflare has sponsored and collaborated with organizations and conferences like [AfroTech](https://afrotech.com/ "Afrotech"), [Grace Hopper Celebration](https://ghc.anitab.org/ "Grace Hopper Celebration"), [Women Who Code](https://www.womenwhocode.com/ "Women Who Code"), [Latinas in Tech](https://latinasintech.org/ "Latinas in Tech"), and more to further our diversity outreach and recruiting.

relatedBlades.title: Cloudflare named one of the Most Loved Workplaces in 2022 by Newsweek and BPI

relatedBlades.copy:
### "Having a workplace that allows our team to feel a sense of belonging and empowerment to do their best work is essential. That is why we have built corporate practices, policies, benefits, and an overall culture that is inclusive of everyone, including LGBTQIA+ folks. Achieving a perfect 100 score on the Human Rights Campaign's Corporate Equality Index, and being recognized alongside all of the other companies that have acted to create inclusive workplaces, is something we are proud of." 

__Jennifer (Jen) Taylor__ Cloudflare SVP, Chief Product Officer

relatedBlades.title: The United Nations Global Compact
relatedBlades.copy:
Cloudflare is a signatory of the [UN Global Compact](https://www.unglobalcompact.org/what-is-gc/participants/141148-Cloudflare-Inc- "UN Global Compact - Cloudflare"). We are committed to the [UN Ten Principles](https://www.unglobalcompact.org/what-is-gc/mission/principles "United Nations Ten Principles") and to helping build a better Internet that supports global [sustainable development goals](https://sdgs.un.org/goals "The 17 Goals").  
- See our latest Impact Report for our [2022 Communication on Progress](https://cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/fBTOgkechN3IcaoT3kbA3/c9b74ee483d28c795d3c7891d8d36034/2022_Cloudflare_Impact_Report.pdf). 

![Sustainable Development Goals - 17 Icons](//cf-assets.www.cloudflare.com/slt3lc6tev37/15Jc0Qk0pMouXhnkmIxMS7/ab92742afd0963bb7f236ae90847e530/SDG_17-Icons.svg)

### "Cloudflare Impact is founded in the belief that the Internet can be a positive force for sustainable development across the globe. We are on a mission to help build a better Internet, and are committed to using our environment, social, and governance (ESG) initiatives to do so." __Matthew Prince__ Co-Founder & CEO, Cloudflare
__Michelle Zatlyn__ President & COO, Cloudflare
